message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is significantly below its true value.  To make a deal, I could come down to $10,500. This is my final offer.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,000. Can you consider this?
